name: This Quiz is Just About Jericho | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Joseph.

	Jericho's full name is Joseph William Wilson. He had a brother, Grant, and has a sister, Rose.

questions.text: Jericho had a physical impairment for much of his career as a Titan. What was it?
questions.explanation:
He was mute.

	When he was a boy, Jericho was taken hostage by some of his father's enemies. Slade was able to rescue him, but not before the kidnappers had started to slit young Jericho's throat, rendering him mute.

questions.text: Jericho is fluent in American Sign Language.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Because he was mute, Jericho learned to use sign language to communicate. In "Action Comics" #584 it was revealed that he used American Sign Language to communicate.

questions.text: Jericho is able to take control of people's body as long as he can make eye contact with them. When did he first discover this power?
questions.correct: When his mother was being attacked
options: When he was being bullied at school
When he was in a car crash
When he was stuck in detention.
questions.explanation:
When his mother was being attacked.

	Jericho attempted to rescue his mother from an assassin when he discovered his power. He can take possession of other people's voluntary functions, but he cannot control the person's voice unless that person is unconscious.

questions.text: Jericho was accepted into the Titans, but why were they initially wary of him?
questions.correct: They had just been betrayed by Terra
questions.explanation:
They had just been betrayed by Terra.

	Terra could control all forms of earthen matter, and became a spy for Slade Wilson. She gave him information necessary to capture the Titans, but Jericho possessed Slade and freed them.

questions.text: Jericho was possessed by the souls of which dimension?
questions.explanation:
Azarath.

	Azarath is the home dimension of Raven, another and perhaps more famous Teen Titan. The souls were weak at first, but eventually came to control Jericho and his actions.

Slade Wilson.

	Jericho was being controlled by the corrupted souls of Azarath, and briefly fought to regain control of himself, begging his father to kill him, which Slade did.

questions.text: Who saved Jericho's spirit onto a computer disk?
questions.explanation:
Cyborg.

	Jericho sought a safe haven in the body of his teammate Cyborg. Cyborg saved Jericho's spirit on a computer disk that was kept in Titans Tower until it was removed by Raven.

Raven.

	Raven used tried-and-true rituals to bring Jericho back and give him a physical body and a pure mind. Once he was revived, Jericho rejoined the Titans and helped them fight the traitorous Bombshell.

questions.text: Jericho served on the new Titans team alongside his sister Rose.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Rose Wilson is the third Wilson family member to take the name Ravager, the first being her brother Grant, who was killed trying to defeat the Titans for H.I.V.E., and the second being Slade's brother-in-law Wade DeFarge.
